evidence.claim: ThriveWell mentions integration with EHR systems to enhance patient care.
ThriveWell adheres to FHIR standards for data exchange in health tech solutions.
HIPAA compliance is emphasized in ThriveWell's security practices for data handling.
They utilize cloud services to facilitate remote care and patient management.
Focused on health data interoperability using HL7 standards.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse functionality found.
